statements: SELECT * FROM Microplastics
SELECT Sample_ID, Location, Quantity FROM Microplastics
SELECT Location, Date_Collected FROM Microplastics WHERE Quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM Microplastics ORDER BY Date_Collected DESC
SELECT Location, Particle_Type FROM Microplastics WHERE Location = 'Beach'
SELECT * FROM Microplastics WHERE Quantity > 10 ORDER BY Date_Collected DESC;
SELECT Sample_ID, Location FROM Microplastics WHERE Particle_Type = 'Microfiber' ORDER BY Quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT Date_Collected, Location FROM Microplastics WHERE Quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY Location, Sample_ID;
SELECT Sample_ID, Quantity, Location FROM Microplastics WHERE Date_Collected >= '2021-01-01' AND Particle_Type LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY Sample_ID DESC, Quantity ASC;
SELECT Location, SUM(Quantity) AS Total_Quantity FROM Microplastics GROUP BY Location HAVING Total_Quantity > 50 ORDER BY Total_Quantity DESC, Location ASC;
SELECT * FROM microplastics_studies;
SELECT study_name, study_date FROM microplastics_studies;
SELECT study_id, location FROM microplastics_studies WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM microplastic_samples WHERE quantity_kg > 5;
SELECT study_id, AVG(quantity_kg) AS average_quantity FROM microplastic_samples GROUP BY study_id;
SELECT * FROM microplastics_studies
SELECT study_name, location FROM microplastics_studies
SELECT study_name, sample_date, quantity_kg FROM microplastics_studies JOIN microplastic_samples ON microplastics_studies.study_id = microplastic_samples.study_id
SELECT study_name, location FROM microplastics_studies WHERE location = 'Atlantic Ocean'
SELECT * FROM microplastic_samples WHERE sample_type = 'sediment' ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT id, location, date, microplastic_type, amount FROM Accumulation;
SELECT location, date, microplastic_type, amount, id FROM Accumulation;
SELECT location, microplastic_type, date FROM Accumulation;
SELECT amount, microplastic_type, location FROM Accumulation;
SELECT * FROM Accumulation WHERE location='Pacific Ocean';
SELECT * FROM Accumulation WHERE microplastic_type = 'PET' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM Accumulation WHERE location = 'Pacific Ocean' AND date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT location, water_temperature FROM MarineEnvironment WHERE water_temperature < 25 ORDER BY water_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM Accumulation JOIN MarineEnvironment ON Accumulation.location = MarineEnvironment.location WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT AE.id, AE.location, ME.water_temperature FROM Accumulation AE JOIN MarineEnvironment ME ON AE.location = ME.location WHERE ME.salinity > 35 ORDER BY AE.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accumulation_of_microplastics;
SELECT location, quantity, microplastic_type FROM accumulation_of_microplastics;
SELECT * FROM research_team WHERE research_area = 'Oceanography';
SELECT lead_scientist, team_name FROM research_team ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT species, amount_of_microplastics FROM marine_animals WHERE amount_of_microplastics > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accumulation_of_microplastics ORDER BY date_collected DESC, quantity DESC;
SELECT species, amount_of_microplastics, location FROM marine_animals WHERE amount_of_microplastics > 100 ORDER BY amount_of_microplastics DESC;
SELECT team_name, research_area FROM research_team WHERE lead_scientist = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM measurement_units WHERE quantity_type = 'weight';
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_microplastics FROM accumulation_of_microplastics GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_microplastics DESC;
SELECT * FROM accumulation_data;
SELECT microplastic_type, timestamp, location FROM accumulation_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE affiliation='University';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM accumulation_data;
SELECT sample_id, timestamp, location FROM accumulation_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, sample_id, analysis_method FROM analysis_results WHERE microplastic_count > 100 ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;

SELECT research_projects.project_name, researchers.researcher_name, research_projects.start_date, research_projects.end_date FROM research_projects INNER JOIN researchers ON research_projects.project_id = researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT location_id, location_name, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
